postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
We are looking for Customer & Sales Service Interns to join our team! If you love working in a fast-paced rewarding environment, then we want to talk to you! 
Interested candidates, kindly send your updated resume to mgt()createtalentsandmodels.com 
 
You can also view Job Application Link Online: 
http://siva-sg.jobstreet.com/_ads/sg/jobs/2016/4/default/20/5175939.htm?9165616 
 Or 
https://www.facebook.com/CreateTalentsandModelsSingapore/ 
 
Job Description & Requirement: 
·         Orientation and familiarisation of the products and services of the company. 
·         Events management -- assist in the quotation, presentation (if any) and execution of trade shows and events. 
·         General administrative work, drafting of invoices, contracts, etc. 
·         Provide Helpdesk Support 
·         Work hand-in-hand with marketing team to maintain corporate website, increase reach of website and other digital/social mediums with up-to-date information and activities 
·         Administer incoming models requests over the phone/email for appointment booking, administrative follow up and referrals. 
·         Candidate must be currently pursuing at least a Diploma or Bachelor's Degree in Business Studies/Administration/Management, Human Resource Management, and Economics, Marketing, Commerce or equivalent. 
·         Internship position(s) for duration of 4 month(s).
title: Create Talents and Models Hiring Students

Job description: 
 
- Handling of phone calls 
- Serving of walk in customers 
- General admin duties 
 
Job Requirements:

- Customer oriented with high level of service attitude 
- Hardworking, outgoing and enthusiastic 
- Able to commit on weekends and Public Holidays 
- Roster job + 5.5 working weeks 
 
Interested candidates, please send us your detailed resume in MS word format, attached with your recent photograph, stating your current/last drawn & expected salary to 
  show contact info 
 (EA Lic. 02C2819 / Reg No. R1658303)
title: Receptionist (5.5 Days)

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Welcome to Web Survey Asia 
 
We offer a Starbucks or Paypal gift card, Bitcoin, or Paypal for people who are selected for a mailing list. 
 
Look us up online using #websurveyasia hashtag, especially Youtube videos. Our Youtube videos also explain our special 50 for US$50 offer for South East Asia.  
 
The form is for those who wish to sign up to participate in surveys and questionnaires. We get requests from all around the World. 
 
Most clients are companies looking to expand into foreign markets, or companies looking to improve products and services in Australia and Asia. 
 
Anyone can join up to these surveys. Please fill in this form and you will be contacted if a survey, product testing, or questionnaire opportunity that matches your profile becomes available.  
 
Please send to your friends as well. We do reward those who sign up their friends. 
 
David Robertson 
Web Survey Asia 
 show contact info
title: Web Survey and Product Testing Work

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
We are looking for Customer Service Coordinator to join our team! If you love working in a fast-paced rewarding environment, then we want to talk to you!  
Interested candidates, kindly send your detailed CVs stating your salary expectations and availability to mgt()createtalentsandmodels.com 
Job Description & Requirement: 
·  Perform administrative duties such as attending and receiving customers, answering phone calls, filing, office maintenance 
·  Handle all general office administrative functions 
·  Coordinate day-to-day staff operations and maintain records 
·  Data compilation and report generation 
·  Coordination of projects 
·  Laising clients and models 
·  Any other ad-hoc duties assigned 
·  Full-Time positions available 
·  Limitless initiative, drive and maturity 
·  Excellent Communication Skills 
·  At least a Diploma levels and above 
·  Willing to multi-task and meticulous with work 
·  Effectively bilingual 
·  Excellent spoken communication skills 
·  Dynamic personality 
·  Enjoy working with new people 
Other benefits: 
 
·  Excellent working environment. 
·  Significant career development. 
·  Wage system including basic commensurate with experience and productivity incentives. 
·  Training provided.
title: Create Talents Pte Ltd - Customer Service Coordinator

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
The Education Future Hub (TEFH) is currently looking for highly-motivated enthusiasts to join us as WSQ Diploma Course Consultant. We offer a platform to government approved courses that are subsidized under SkillsFuture Credit (SSG) for Individuals and Corporate level. We also offer a good career path for suitable candidates. At the same time, sign up and be awarded S$1,000 for completion of WSQ Diploma Course. 
 
Role: 
To promote a Leadership Development/ People Management Diploma/ Certification Module course subsidized by WDA and SkillsFuture Credit (SSG) to Individuals and Corporate level. 
Completion of course modules will aid Singaporeans to cope with the many changes in the years ahead, make learning and adapting "a lifelong endeavour". This is in line with the Singapore Government's initiative to encourage lifelong learning, increase productivity and to boost employability for employees. 
Join our team of WSQ Leadership Course Consultants and spread the vision of cultivating lifelong learning mentality and enjoy a lucrative salary scheme. 
 
Requirements & Benefits 
➥ Singaporeans 
➥ Age 21 above 
➥ Full-time/ Part-time/ Freelance Position 
➥ Attractive salary package for suitable candidates 
➥ Marketing/ Event experience preferred (e.g. real estate, insurance, telesales, etc.) 
Those who are highly motivated but with no Sales or Marketing experience are also welcome. 
 
Email me if interested. Thanks!
title: WSQ Diploma Course Consultant (Part time/Full time)

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
I need someone to visit a hospital in Novena area, sit at the A&E; pretend to be waiting for a friend, and take a photo of someone working there. I will provide more details later on. 
 
Doesnt matter male or female, or how you look like. Anyone can walk into a A&E; and blend in as they see all kinds of patients. As long as you can do the job well and follow simple instructions.  
 
$100 cash payment. If the photo is very clear and can see his face clearly, the payment will be bumped to $200.  
 
I can meet you right after the job is done and when you send me the photos and delete them off your phone, I will do the transfer to you immediate at the ATM machine. So no worries of scam. 
 
Genuine offer. Nothing illegal, so no worries.
title: One pax required for simple task
